title: Integral Calculus
description: Integral calculus: Definite and indefinite integrals, techniques of integration, improper integrals, infinite series, applications. Credit not awarded for both MATH 1552 and MATH 1502, MATH 1504, MATH 1512 or MATH 1555.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 1550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1501 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 15X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
